charges.charge_description: Traveling in interstate commerce from the State of North Carolina to the State of Illinois with intent to avoid prosecution for five felonies, namely, Second Degree Rape; Sex Offense-Parental Role; Indecent Liberties with a Child; Second Degree Sexual Offense; and Crime Against Nature, charged by the GOLDSBORO POLICE DEPARTMENT (GPD), Goldsboro, North Carolina in violation of 18 USC, Sec 1073 (Unlawful Flight to Avoid Prosecution or Giving Testimony)
